title: All team names and flags appear correctly and up to date
custom_preconds:
Given the user has launched the app 
And has navigated to the Bracket from the navigational drop down
custom_steps: When we review all team names & flags
custom_expected:
Then all team names & flags appear correctly & up to date
And team flags appear correctly in retina & non-retina devices

title: Tapping anywhere in a pool pad on the Bracket Main menu takes user to a details page for that particular round/pool
custom_preconds:
Given the user has launched the app 
And has navigated to the Bracket from the navigational drop down
custom_steps: When the user taps anywhere on one of the pool pads
custom_expected: Then the user will be taken to the details page for that particular round/pool.

title: Header text indicates round, pool, date range for round, and venue
custom_preconds:
Given the user has launched the app 
And has navigated to the Bracket from the navigational drop down
And the user has tapped the Qualifiers Round from the bracket navigation
custom_expected: Then the user will see header text at the top indicating the round, the pool, a tappable link to the schedule page, the date range of the round & the venue for the round

title: Tap outside of the pool pad to dismiss the current view and return to the main bracket page
custom_preconds:
Given the user has launched the app 
And has navigated to the Bracket from the navigational drop down
And the user has tapped the Qualifiers Round from the bracket navigation
custom_steps: When the user taps anywhere outside of the pool pad area
custom_expected: Then the user is returned to the main bracket page

title: Tapping View Schedule takes the user to the schedule page
custom_preconds:
Given the user has launched the app 
And has navigated to the Bracket from the navigational drop down
And the user has tapped the Qualifiers Round from the bracket navigation
custom_steps: When the user taps on View Schedule underneath the pool name
custom_expected:
Then the user will be taken to the Schedule page
And it will be anchored to the particular round/pool selected

title: The pool pod will display a table consisting of the teams included in the pool.
custom_preconds:
Given the user has launched the app 
And has navigated to the Bracket from the navigational drop down
And the user has tapped Round 1 from the bracket navigation
custom_steps: When the user looks at the pool pad
custom_expected:
Then the teams will be displayed sorted by rank with a Rank, Team, W, L, Last Game, and Next Game column
And the Round # and Pool letter will be displayed at the top left
And a tappable link to view the schedule for that pool will be below it
And the Date Range of the Pool will be displayed at the top right
And the venue will be below it

title: When team(s) advance, the selected team row will highlight blue and text will be bolded.
custom_preconds:
Given the user has launched the app 
And has navigated to the Bracket from the navigational drop down
And the user has tapped Round 1 from the bracket navigation
custom_steps: When a team(s) advance to the next round
custom_expected: Then that team(s) row will be highlighted blue and the text will be bolded.

title: Take note that in Round 2 we will have pools 1 and 2 rather than alphabetical
custom_preconds:
Given the user has launched the app 
And has navigated to the Bracket from the navigational menu
custom_steps: When the user looks at the pool pads in Round 2
custom_expected: Then they will be labelled with numbers 1 and 2.

title: Header text indicates round, pool, date range for round, and venue
custom_preconds:
Given the user has launched the app 
And has navigated to the Bracket from the navigational drop down
And the user has tapped Round 2 from the bracket navigation
custom_expected: Then the user will see header text at the top indicating the round, the pool, a tappable link to the schedule page, the date range of the round & the venue for the round

title: Tapping outside of the current pool pad will dismiss the current view and return to the main bracket page
custom_preconds:
Given the user has launched the app 
And has navigated to the Bracket from the navigational drop down
And the user has tapped a pool in Round 2 from the bracket navigation
custom_steps: When the user taps anywhere outside the current pool pad
custom_expected: Then the user is returned to the main bracket page

title: Tapping View Schedule takes the user to the schedule page
custom_preconds:
Given the user has launched the app 
And has navigated to the Bracket from the navigational drop down
And the user has tapped a pool in Round 2 from the bracket navigation
custom_steps: When the user taps on View Schedule underneath the pool name
custom_expected:
Then the user will be taken to the Schedule page
And it will be anchored to the particular round/pool selected

title: Final Game State will be indicated with "Final" and show the final score
custom_preconds:
Given the user has launched the app 
And has navigated to the Bracket from the navigational drop down
And the user has tapped a pool in Round 2 from the bracket navigation
custom_steps: When any of the games have been completed
custom_expected:
Then the user will see the word "Final" next to the game number 
And the user will see the final score

title: Pending Game State for undetermined teams will show a TBD image and the slotted team will be indicated as "TBD"
custom_preconds:
Given the user has launched the app 
And has navigated to the Bracket from the navigational drop down
And the user has tapped a pool in Round 2 from the bracket navigation
custom_steps: When the team(s) for an upcoming game are still pending
custom_expected:
Then the undetermined team(s) will have a TBD image 
And the undetermined team(s) will be indicated as "TBD"

title: Header text indicates round, pool, date range for round, and venue
custom_preconds:
Given the user has launched the app 
And has navigated to the Bracket from the navigational drop down
And the user has tapped the Championship Round pool pad from the bracket navigation
custom_expected: Then the user will see header text at the top indicating the round, the pool, a tappable link to the schedule page, the date range of the round & the venue for the round

title: Tapping outside of the current pool pad will dismiss the current view and return to the main bracket page
custom_preconds:
Given the user has launched the app 
And has navigated to the Bracket from the navigational drop down
And the user has tapped the Championship Round pool pad from the bracket navigation
custom_steps: When the user taps anywhere outside the current pool pad
custom_expected: Then the user is returned to the main bracket page

title: Tapping View Schedule takes the user to the schedule page
custom_preconds:
Given the user has launched the app 
And has navigated to the Bracket from the navigational drop down
And the user has tapped the Championship Round pool pad from the bracket navigation
custom_steps: When the user taps on View Schedule underneath the pool name
custom_expected:
Then the user will be taken to the Schedule page
And it will be anchored to the particular round/pool selected

title: Final Game State will be indicated with "Final" and show the final score
custom_preconds:
Given the user has launched the app 
And has navigated to the Bracket from the navigational drop down
And the user has tapped the Championship Round pool pad from the bracket navigation
custom_steps: When any of the games have been completed
custom_expected:
Then the user will see the word "Final" next to the game number 
And the user will see the final score

title: Pending Game State for undetermined teams will show a TBD image and the slotted team will be indicated as "TBD"
custom_preconds:
Given the user has launched the app 
And has navigated to the Bracket from the navigational drop down
And the user has tapped the Championship Round pool pad from the bracket navigation
custom_steps: When the team(s) for an upcoming game are still pending
custom_expected:
Then the undetermined team(s) will have a TBD image 
And the undetermined team(s) will be indicated as "TBD"
And the TBD image appears correctly in retina & non-retina devices

title: The winner of the Final will be moved to the Winner's Box
custom_preconds:
Given the user has launched the app 
And has navigated to the Bracket from the navigational drop down
And the user has tapped the Championship Round pool pad from the bracket navigation
custom_steps: When the Final game has been completed
custom_expected: Then the winning team will populate the Winner's Box
